TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_bed
inventory=[{"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 45, "index": 10}, {"type": "cyan_terracotta", "quantity": 12, "index": 11}, {"type": "gray_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 14}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 17, "index": 26}, {"type": "green_concrete", "quantity": 27, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 60, "index": 36}, {"type": "spruce_sapling", "quantity": 18, "index": 38}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 32, "index": 42}, {"type": "magenta_concrete_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: I need to craft acacia planks in order to craft the gray bed. To craft the acacia planks, I need to place the acacia log in slot 15 into the crafting grid, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1
